data.name: Octo Vinctum: Saga of the Galactic Stardom War
data.detailed_description:
Finally, a "retro" game that actually plays like a true retro game!

What starts out as a young girl on a mission to fulfill her childhood dreams unfolds into a supernatural struggle for the fate of the planet. Sabrina Seltzer decides to embark on a journey, with the help of her mysterious cousin Sonya, to become a world-famous pop star. However, malevolent forces have arisen to stop her due to a terrible curse placed on the world sent by the entertainment overlord Pop Czar Feld. Sabrina and her friends must defeat their enemies using the power of her kind words in pure, traditional JRPG turn-based combat.

EXPLORE THE WORLD OF OCTO VINCTUM

Travel through the many cities of Vinland to uncover the many mysteries scattered about.
Talk with the townsfolk!
Go shopping! Buy "weapons" like microphones and instruments to raise your Kindness and deal more damage. Buy clothes to raise your Confidence or Intelligence and better guard against enemy "attalks"!
Get from place to place in a Taxi, or warp through parallel dimensions with the Managic Backwards Longjump!

KILL YOUR ENEMIES WITH KINDNESS

"Attalk" your enemies with your words! "Ignore" their rude behavior to survive!
Use the power of your talents to turn the tide in battle.
Tried-and-true classic JRPG gameplay!
Dozes of wacky characters with wacky abilities!

EXPERIENCE A STORY OF EPIC PROPORTIONS

Live the story through visual novel segments where you control Sabrina.
Interact with the many usual and unusual people that populate Vinland.
Build support between your allies through the Friendship system and watch their conversations!
See past the "happy" and "bright" lies and discover the evil the lies beneath!

MADE WITH CARE AND LOVE
Nearly authentic pixel art based on REAL pixel art!
Carefully hand-drawn characters, environments, etc. drawn the old fashioned way!
Inspired by all the classic RPGs of the 80s and 90s!
A rockin' retro soundtrack!
Full of secrets, sidequests, and lore!

Are you a bad enough player to save the Planet and revive the power of MANAGIC?

data.short_description: A JRPG/Visual Novel hybrid designed like the legendary RPGs of yesteryear! Vanquish the toughest foes using the power of kind words and musical talent! Uncover the dark and supernatural secrets that lurk beneath a cheery and cutesy world! "Prove the justice of our culture!"
